product_name: Marmot Midweight Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Marmot Midweight Half-Zip top is ideal for stop-and-go activities in cool weather. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) Cocona(TM) blend manages moisture and offers UV resistance. Polartec Power Dry has a patented, moisture-wicking bi-component construction that helps keep your skin dry as you sweat. Cocona is derived from discarded coconut shells rendered into activated charcoal, which is then reduced, blended and fused into the fabric. Activated charcoal naturally removes odors and particles from fabric-just like your water filter-and won't wash out. Naturally UV-resistant fabric with a UPF 40 rating shields skin from the sun's harmful ultraviolet rays. Flatseam construction and tag-free neckline help reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: The Marmot Midweight Half-Zip top is ideal for stop-and-go activities in cool weather.
